name: ImmichFrame
description: ImmichFrame is a digital photo frame web application that connects to your Immich server and displays your photos as a fullscreen slideshow. Built natively from source using ASP.NET Core and SvelteKit, without Docker.

notes.text: After installation, edit `/app/Config/Settings.yml` and set **ImmichServerUrl** and **ApiKey**. Then restart the service with `systemctl restart immichframe`.
Get your API Key at: Immich → Account Settings → API Keys → New API Key.
The process runs as a dedicated unprivileged user `immichframe`.
